name: Frenzy: The Ridden
description:
VR ONLY

Survive the night against The Ridden - enemies that will soon feature in the game Frenzy VR!

You crashed your car escaping the city, and are now trapped here. Find weapons to survive as long as possible against the ridden, including a boss fight and parasites that attack you from range. The ridden have one big weakness, their limbs fall off easily! Dismember and ragdoll the zombies and show them that they are actually trapped here with you...
